definitions.title: prep.
definitions.body: with (Aram. [[עִם]], 9am dele comma, Sab. [[עם]] DHM:Epigr. Denkm. 12 Hom:Chrest. 51; cf. Ar. ma9a (but v. Prät:BAS. i. 26)), sf. [[עִמִּי]]:46 and [[עִמָּדִי]]:45 (prob. akin to Ar. ma9o side, 9inda beside: cf. √ [[ענד]]), without difference of meaning ([[עמי]] in Pent. Ge 31:31, Ge 39:7, Ge 39:12, Ge 39:14, Ex 33:12, Le 26:21, Le 26:23, Le 26:27, Le 26:40 [H] Nu 22:19; Jos-K. 13 t.; Ps 42:9, Ps 86:17, Job 10:17, Ru 1:11, Es 7:8; in Da 7 t., Ezr Ne Ch 11 t.: [[עמדי]] in Pent. Gn [JE] 14 t., Ex 17:2, Le 25:23, De 5:28, De 32:34, De 32:39; Ju S 7 t.; Ps 23:4, Ps 50:11, Ps 55:19, Ps 101:6; Job 14 t:, Ru 1:8); [[עִמְְּ]], † [[עִמְּכָה]] 1Sa 1:26, [[עִמָָּךְ]]; [[עִמּוֹ]], [[עִמָּהּ]]; [[עִמָּ֫נוּ]]; [[עִמָּכֶם]]; [[עִמָּם]]:27 (Ge 18:16, etc.: Gn-K 20 t.; Ne 13:25; not Ezr Ch), and [[עִמָּהֶם]]:23 (chiefly late: Nu 22:12, De 29:16 (v:De 29:24 [[עמם]]), Jon 1:3, Job 1:4, and 19 t. Ne Ezr Ch):—

of fellowship and companionship (Lat. cum), as Ge 13:1 [[ולוט עמו]] and Lot with him, Ge 18:16, Ge 19:30, Ge 24:54 [[הוא והאנשׁים אשׁר עמו]], [[וכל]] [[ישׂראל עמו]] Jos 7:24 al.; + oft. Peculiar to Ch Ezr are clauses introd. by …[[ועמהם]] 1Ch 12:34, 1Ch 13:2, 1Ch 15:8 +, Ezr 8:13, Ezr 8:14 (Aram. Ezr 5:2) +; so …[[ועמו]] 1Ch 12:28, 2Ch 17:14 – 2Ch 17:18, 2Ch 26:17, Ezr 8:3–Ezr 8:12, Ezr 8:33. Coupling substantives, together with, chiefly in poetry: De 12:23 [[לא תאכל הנפשׁ עם הבשׂר]], Jos 11:21, Ju Jdg 16:3, Ec 7:11; 2Sa 1:24 [[שָׁנִי עִם עֲדָנִים]], De 32:14 [[עִם חֵלֶב כרים]], v:De 32:14, v:De 32:24, v:De 32:25, Am 4:10, Is 25:11, Is 34:7, Je 6:11, Je 51:40, Na 3:12, Ps 66:15 [[אעשׂה בקר עם עתודים]], Ps 81:3, Ps 83:8, Ps 87:4, Ps 89:14, Ps 104:25 +, Ct So 1:11, So 4:13, So 4:13 [[כפרים עם נרדים]], v:So 4:14, v:So 4:14, So 5:1, So 5:1, So 5:1. Unusually, Es 9:25 [[אמר עם הספר]] he ordered in conjunction with writing, in a written order. Poet. or late uses: Ps 42:9 [[ובלילה שִׁירׂה עמי]], Ps 89:22 [[אשׁר יׇדִי תִּכּוֹן עמו]], v:Ps 89:25; in Jb of the companionship of sufferings or prosperity, Job 6:4 [[תִצֵּי שַׁדַּי עמדי]], Job 17:2 [[אם לא הֲתֻלִים עמדי]], Job 29:6 [[וְחוּר יׇחוּק עִמדי פלגי]] [[שׁמן]], v:Job 29:20 [[כבודי חָדָשׁ עמדי]], 2Ch 14:5 [[ואין עמו]] [[מלחמה]], Job 16:19 [[ישׁ עמך מלחמות]], Job 28:10 [[עִמָּכֶם אֲשָׁמוֹת]]. Hence, in partic. a. of aid, Ex 23:5, De 22:4; 1Ch 12:19; esp. of God, Ge 21:22 [[אלהים עמך]], Ge 26:3 [[ואהיה עמך]], v:Ge 21:33, Ge 31:3, Ge 31:5, Ex 3:12, Jos 1:5, Is 8:10 [[כי עמנו]] [[אל]] Ps 23:4, Ps 46:8, Ps 46:12, Job 29:5 + oft. (cf. [[אֵת]], Ge 39:2, Ge 39:3, Ge 39:21, Ge 39:23, Is 43:5 +): so [[הִתְחַזַּק עם]] 1Ch 11:10, 2Ch 16:9, Da 10:21, [[עָזַר עם]] 1Ch 12:21, [[כי גם ידם עם דוד]] 1Sa 22:17, 2Sa 3:12, 1Ch 4:10 (cf. Ex 23:1, and II. [[אֵת]]

definitions.title: 1 a
definitions.body: ). With the help of (= Gk. su/n), 1Sa 14:45 [[כי עם אלהים עשׂה היום הזה]], Da 11:39 (rare).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Of actions done jointly with another, as [[ירשׁ עם]] inherit with, Ge 21:10, [[כרת ברית עם]] Ge 26:28 + oft., [[עם]] ([[חִלֵּק]])[[חָלַק ]] to share with Jos 22:8, Is 53:12 +; cf. De 10:9 [[חֵלֶק וְנַחֲלָה עִם אֶחָיו]], De 18:1.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: If the common action be of the nature of a contest or combat, [[עִם]] is with in the sense of against: so often with [[נִלְחַם]] to fight, [[נִשְׁפַּט]] to dispute, [[נֶאֱבַק]] to wrestle, [[רִיב]] to strive (see these verbs), Ge 26:20, Ge 30:8, Ge 32:29; [[בּא בְּמִשְׁפָּט עם]] to enter into judgment with Is 3:14 +, Job 14:3 ([[הֵבִיא]]), [[עִם]] ´[[רִיב לי]] Ho 4:1 +; hence, without a verb expressing the idea explicitly, Ps 94:16 [[מי יקום לי]] [[עִם מְרֵעִים]] in the struggle with evil-doers ? v:b Ps 55:19 [[כי בְרַבִּים היו עמדי]] for as many are they in combat with me, Job 9:14 [[אֶבְחֲרָה דְבָרַי עמו]] in the contest with him, Job 10:17 b, Job 16:21; perhaps [[חָדַק עִם]] Job 9:2, Job 25:4 (cf.

definitions.title: 4 b
definitions.body: end).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: Of dealing with a person, or of the relation in which one stands with, or towards, another: as [[עשׂה חסד עם]] to do kindness with Ge 24:12 + oft. (in 1 pers. observe that in this phr. [[עמדי]], not [[עמי]], is regul. used, Ge 19:19, Ge 20:13, Ge 40:14, 1Sa 20:14, 2Sa 10:2 [‖ 1Ch 19:2 [[עמי]]: here only], al.), [[עשׂה טוב עם]] Ge 26:29 +, v. also Ge 20:9, Ge 31:29, De 33:21, Ju Jdg 15:3, Job 10:12, Job 13:20, Job 42:8, Ps 86:17 (cf. [[אִתְּכֶם]] De 1:30, De 10:21; and Aram. Da 3:32), Ps 119:124, Ps 126:2 (1Sa 12:24), Job 33:29; [[הֵיטִיד עם]] Ge 32:10, Ge 32:13 +, [[הֵרַע עִם]] Ge 31:7; [[רָחָה עם]] be well pleased with Ps 50:18, Job 34:9; [[דִּבֶּר עם]] to speak with (subj. usu. God) Ex 19:9 + (v. [[דִּבֶּר]]

definitions.title: 3 e
definitions.body: ), hence [[דָּבָר עִם]] Ju Jdg 18:7, Jdg 18:28, 2Sa 3:17, 1Ki 1:7, Job 15:11 [[דָּבָר לָאַט עמך]] a word (spoken) gently with thee, cf. Job 11:5 [[ויפתח שׂפתיו עמך]]; [[יֵאָמֵן]] [[עם]] 2Ch 1:9: and with adjj. [[תמים עם]] perfect with (i.e. toward) De 18:13, Ps 18:24, [[שָׁלֵם עם]] 1Ki 8:61 +; cf. [[וְלִבָּם לאׁ נׇכוֹן עִמּוֹ]] Ps 78:37, 2Sa 21:4, 2Sa 23:5, 1Ki 3:6 ([[עמך]]), Mic 6:8 [[הַחְנֵעַ לֶכֶת עִם אֱלֱהָיו]], Ps 73:22 toward thee, 1Ch 19:6, Ho 12:1 (?); also [[הָלַךְ קְרִי]] [[עִם]] Le 26:21 ff. (7 t.), [[מַמְרִים הֱיִיתֶם עם]] De 9:7, De 9:24, De 31:27, 2Ch 16:10, 2Ch 26:19, Ps 85:5, Job 10:17 a.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: Of a common lot, Ge 18:23 [[האף תספה]] [[חדיק עם רשׁע]] together with the wicked, v:Ge 18:25, Job 3:14, Job 3:15, Is 38:11, Ps 26:9 [[אל תאסף עם חטּאים נפשׁי]], v:Ps 26:9b, v:Ps 28:3, Ps 28:3, Ps 69:29, Job 30:1, 1Ch 24:5; hence like, Ps 73:5 [[ועם אדם לא יְנֻנׇּ֑עוּ]] with (i.e. like) men (in general), Ps 106:6 [[חטאנו עם אבותינו]], Ec 2:16 [[ואיך ימות הֶחָכָם]] [[עם הכסיל]] i.e. like the fool.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: Of equality or resemblance generally (poet.), Job 9:26 [[חָֽלְפוּ עִם אֳנִיּוֹת אֵבֶה]] they pass by with, i.e. as swiftly as, skiffs of reed, Job 37:18 [[תרקיע]] [[עמו שׁחקים]] i.e. like him, Job 40:15 [[אשׁר עשׂיתי עמך]]; so [[נִמְשַׁל עִם]] Ps 28:1, Ps 143:7, [[נֶחְשַׁב עִם]] Ps 88:5. †

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: Of time, = as long as, Ps 72:5 [[יִירָאוּ ְעם]] [[שׁמשׁ]] as long as the sun endureth (cf. Aram. Da 3:33, Da 4:31; also Ovid. Am. i. 15, 16 cum sole et luna semper Aratus erit); at the time of (?) 2Ch 21:19 (but rd. perh. [[מֵחָלְיוֹ]]); and c. inf. (late), Ezr 1:11; [[עִם הֵעָלוֹת הַגּוֹלָה]] (cf. a(/ma tw=| sq. inf. Ju Jdg 3:21, Jdg 9:33; also [[עִם]] Sir 40:14).

Of a locality, close to, beside: † Ge 25:11 [[וישׁב יחחק עם נאר לחי ראי]] beside the well of, etc., Ge 35:4 [[תַּחַת הָאֵלָה אשׁר עם שׁכם]] (so, after [[אשׁר]], Jos 7:2, Ju Jdg 9:6, Jdg 18:22, 2Sa 13:23), Jos 19:46 (?), Ju Jdg 18:3 [[הֵמָּה עִם]] [[בֵּית מִיכָה]] (so Jdg 19:11, 2Sa 20:8), 1Sa 10:2, 2Sa 6:7 [[וַיׇּ֫מָת]] ´[[שָׁם עִם אֲרוֹן הא]], 2Sa 19:38, 2Sa 24:16, 1Ki 1:9, 1Ch 13:14 by the house of O., in its own house (v. Be), 1Ch 21:15 (2Sa 24:16), 1Ch 26:16 (cf. [[אֵת]]
). By a person, De 5:28 [[וְאַתָּה עֲמׂד פּׂה עמדי]] by me, 1Sa 1:26 [[הַנִּצֶּבֶת עִמְּכָה]] +; of one living near another, Ex 22:24, Le 25:35, Le 25:36, Le 25:39, Le 25:47.
Of persons, [[עִם]] is spec.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: in the house or family or service of (apud, chez): Ge 23:4 [[גֵּר וְתוֹשָׁב עמך]] (fig. of ´[[י]] Le 25:23, Ps 39:13), Ge 27:44, Ge 29:14 [[וַיֵשֶׁב עִמּוֹ]], v:Ge 29:25 [[עבדתי עמך]] I have served with thee (so v:Ge 29:30, cf. De 15:16), Ge 31:38, Le 25:6, Le 25:40, Le 25:40, Le 25:50, Le 25:53, De 22:2, De 23:17, Ju Jdg 17:10, 2Sa 19:34, 1Ki 11:22; cf. 1Sa 2:21 ´[[עם י]] i.e. at his sanctuary.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: In the possession of (Lat. penes): Ge 24:25 straw, etc., is [[עִמָּנוּ]], Ge 31:32, De 17:19 [[והיתה עמו]] with him, at his side, De 29:16, Job 28:14 [[וְיׇם אָמַר אֵין עִמָּדִי]]; = stored up with, De 32:34 [[כָּמֻס עִמָּדִי]] Job 27:13 (but rd. here prob. [[מֵאֵל]]; cf. Job 20:29); of ethical or mental attributes, 1Sa 25:25 [[וּנְבָלָה עִמּוֹ]], Job 12:13 [[עִמּוֹ חָנְמָה וּגְבוּרָה]], v:Job 12:16, Job 25:2, Ps 130:7, 2Ch 19:3, 2Ch 19:7. Cf. fig. Ps 36:10 [[כי עמך מְקוֹר חַיִּים]].

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: In the custody or care of, 1Sa 9:23 [[שִׂים]] [[אׂתָהּ עִמָָּךְ]]; 1Sa 22:23 [[כִּי מִשְׁמֶרֶת אַתָּה עִמָּדִי]]: cf. Job 17:3 [[עָרְבֵנִי עִמָָּךְ]] be surety for me with thyself.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: Beside = except, De 32:39 [[אֵין אלהים עִמָּדִי]], Ps 73:25 [[ועמך לא חפחתי בארץ]] and beside thee I delight not (in aught that is) upon earth (al. in comparison of thee,

definitions.title: 1 f
definitions.body: ), 2Ch 14:10 [[וְאֵין עִמְּ ְלַעֲזׁר]] there is none beside thee to help, 2Ch 20:6; perh. Ho 9:8 (Hi Ke ; but very dub., v. Comm.). Cf. [[אֵת]]

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: With = friendly with, Ge 31:2 [[כי איננו]] [[עמי]] (syn. v:Ge 31:5 [[אֶל]] towards), 2Ki 10:15 [[לְבָבִי עִם לְבָֽבְְ]], Pr 23:7 [[וְלִבּוֹ בַל עִמָָּךְ]].
Idiom. of a thought or purpose present with one:—†

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: ´[[עִם לְבַב פ]], esp. in Dt. and the later Deut. style, De 8:5 [[וְיׇדַעְתָּ עִם לְבָבְְ]] thou shalt know with thy heart, De 15:9 [[פן יהיה דבר עם]] [[לבבך בליעל]] a wicked thought with thy heart, Jos 14:7 I brought back word [[כָאשׁר עם לבבי]] ´[[היה עם לְבַב פ]], esp. of a purpose, 1Ki 8:17 [[ויהי עם]] ´[[לבב דוד לִבְנוֹת וגו]] i.e. it was David's purpose to build, etc., v:1Ki 8:18, v:1Ki 8:18, 1Ki 10:2 (= 2Ch 6:7, 2Ch 6:8, 2Ch 6:8, 2Ch 9:1), 1Ch 22:7, 1Ch 28:2 (both based on 1Ki 8:17, etc.), 2Ch 1:11, 2Ch 24:4, 2Ch 29:10; rather differently, to muse or talk with one's heart, Ps 77:7, Ec 1:16. †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[עִם]] alone, = in one's consciousness, whether of knowledge or memory or purpose (cf. [[אֵת]]

definitions.title: 3 b;
definitions.body: 9inda W:AG ii. § 66): Nu 14:24 [[עֵקֶב הָֽיְתָה]] [[רוּחַ אַחֶרֶת עִמּוֹ]] i.e. operating in his mind, 1Ki 11:11 [[יען אשׁר היתה זאת עמך]], 1Ch 28:12 the pattern of all [[אשׁר היה בָרוּחַ עמו]] that was in spirit (i.e. mentally) with him, Ps 50:11 [[וְזִיז שָׂדַי עִמָּדִי]] is with me (i.e. is known to me; ‖[[ידעתי]]), prob. also Ps 73:23, Ps 139:18 (= in thy thought and care); Job 9:35 [[לא כן אנכי עמדי]] not so am I with myself (my consciousness—or conscience—does not tell me that I need dread him), Job 10:13 [[ידעתי כי זאת עמך]] i.e. that this was thy purpose (‖[[אֵלֶּה חָפַנְתָּ]] [[בִּלְבָבְֶָ]]), Job 15:9 [[ולא עמנו הוא]] and is not with us (= in our knowledge; ‖[[וְלאׁ נֵדָָע]]), Job 23:10 [[כי ידע]] [[דרך עמדי]] the way of which I am conscious (De; Ew Di the way attending me, my usual way), v:Job 23:14 [[וְכָהֵנׇּה רַבּוֹת עמו]] i.e. he has many such purposes, Job 27:11 [[אֲשֶׁד עִם שַׁדָּי לאׁ אֲכַחֵד]] i.e. his purposes or principles of action. Also sts. in the judgment or estimation of, 1Sa 2:26 [[טוֹב עִם]], 2Sa 6:22 [[נִכְבַּד עִם]], perh. [[חָדַק עִם]] Job 9:2, Job 25:4 (Ges Bu; but Ew as

definitions.title: 1 c,
definitions.body: Hi De beside, in comparison of). †

Metaph. together with = in spite of, notwithstanding Ne 5:18 [[וְעִם זֶה]] (cf. ma9a W:AG ii. § 57; in Heb. [[בְּ]] is the more usual syn.).—In 1Sa 16:12 [[אַדְמׂנִי עִם יְפֵה עֵינַיִם]] (cf. 1Sa 17:42 [[עִם יְפֵה מַרְאֶה]]), if text correct, [[יפה]] must be a neuter subst., with beauty of eyes; but rd. prob. (Gr Bu) [[עֶלֶם]] a youth (1Sa 17:56, 1Sa 20:22) for [[עם]] (v. HPS; Che:Expos. T. x. 521 [[אַדְמׂנִי]] [[עֶחֶם]], cf. La 4:7). [[מֵעִם]]:72 from with or beside (= para\ with a gen.: cf. [[מֵאֵת]]): hence

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: after verbs of departing, taking, removing, etc., Ge 13:14 [[אַחֲרֵי הִפָּרֶד־]] [[לוֹט מֵעִמּוֹ]], Ge 26:16 [[לֵךְ מֵעִמָּנוּ]], 1Sa 10:2, 1Sa 10:9, 1Sa 14:17 [[מי הלך]] [[מעמנו]], 2Sa 1:2, 1Sa 16:14 [[סרה מעם שׁאול]] ´[[ורוח י]], 1Sa 18:12; 2Ki 2:9 [[בטרם אֶלָּקַח מעמך]]; 2Sa 15:28 [[עַד בּוֹא]] [[דָבָר מֵעִמָּכֶם]]; of heart turning ´[[מעם י]] De 29:17, 1Ki 11:9; after [[שׁאל]] to ask, Ex 22:13, De 10:12 ´[[מה י]] [[שׁׂאֵל מֵעִמָָּךְ]], 1Sa 1:17, 1Sa 20:28 (Niph.), Is 7:11 +; [[דרשׁ]] to require, De 18:19, De 23:22, 1Ki 14:5 (to inquire); [[יחא מֵעִם פרעה]] from (being) with Ph. Ex 8:8, Ex 8:25, Ex 8:26, Ex 9:33 +: cf. 2Sa 3:26, 1Sa 18:13 [[ויסירהו שׁאול מעמו]]; and [[מַעִם פְּנֵי]] Ge 44:29, Job 1:12. † Sq. a word denoting a place, Ge 48:12 [[וַיּוֹחֵא יוֹסֵָף אׂתָם מֵעִם]] [[בִּרְכָּיו]], Ex 21:14 [[מֵעִם מִזְבְּחִי]] (cf. 1Sa 2:33), Ju Jdg 9:37 [[מֵעִם טַבּוּר הארץ]], 1Sa 20:34 [[מֵעִם הַשֻּׁלְחָן]]; Job 28:4 [[מֵעִם גׇּר]] away from, far from (si vera l.). †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Ge 24:27 [[אשׁר לא עזב חסדו מעם אֲדׂנִי]] (cf. with [[הכרית]] 1Sa 20:15, [[הסיר]] 2Sa 7:15, 1Ch 17:13 (‖ 2Sa 7:15 [[מן]]), [[הפיר]] Ps 89:34); Ru 4:10 [[לאׂ־יִכָּרֵת שֵׁם מֵעִם]]. †

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: From the possession, or custody, of  (cf. [[עִם]]

definitions.title: 3 b, c
definitions.body: ): so with [[גזל]] Ge 31:31, [[ערב]] to take in pledge Ge 44:32, [[גנב]] Ex 22:11, [[יחא]] (subj. a slave; cf. [[עם]]

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: Expressing origination or authorship: 1Sa 20:7 [[כִּי כָֽלְתָה הָרָעָה מֵעִמּוֹ]], v:1Sa 20:9; v:1Sa 20:33 (cf. [[מֵאֵת]] Es 7:17); esp. of ´[[י]] (cf. [[מֵאֵת]]

definitions.title: c
definitions.body: ), Ge 41:32 ´[[נׇכוֹן הַדָּבָר מֵעִם הא]] is established from, on the part of, God, 1Ki 2:33 ´[[מעם י]] …[[שׁלום ]], 1Ki 12:15 (2Ch 10:15) [[כִי הָֽיְתָה סִבָּה]] ´[[מעם י]], Is 8:18 signs and portents ´[[מעם י]], Is 28:29 [[יחאה]] ´[[גם זאת מעם י]], Is 29:6, Ps 121:2 ´[[עֶזְרִי מעם י]] Ru 2:12. And of a judgment proceeding from any one: 2Sa 3:28 ´[[נקי מעם י]] = pronounced guiltness by ´[[י]], Job 34:33 [[הֲמֵעִמְְּ]] at thy judgment shall he requite ? (cf. [[מִן]]

definitions.title: 2 d
definitions.body: end).
